thread.title: Tournament Operations Internship - Sports Marketing

title: Tournament Operations Internship - Sports Marketing
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Tournament Operations Internship   Interns will learn how to operate golf tournaments through their active involvement with all aspects of tournament operations from course setup to course breakdown under the direct supervision and mentorship of our staff members.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
